org.omg.CORBA_2_3

Class ORB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omg.CORBA.ORB
      • org.omg.CORBA_2_3.ORB

  • public abstract class ORB
extends ORB
    A class extending org.omg.CORBA.ORB to make the ORB portable under the OMG CORBA version 2.3 specification.
